title: DEATH SWORN WARD!!! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO PLEASE
body:
I DISENCHANTED THE DEATH SWORN WARD!!!     
I just completed the mission for the death sworn ward shard and I really wanted it, and out of excitement of getting it, i DISENCHANTED IT thinking i would use (about) 300 of orange essence to unlock it. Only leading to me disenchanting it like a idiot.   {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}              
 Is there a way of getting the ward shard back?

replies.body: Hey!  Yeouch!  Macer200 is taking the best steps here for this situation, I highly recommend putting in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well.  We'll look into this and see if we can find options for you.
I just did the same thing, am sending in a support ticket to hopefully get it back.
